Name: Infinity Trip
About the game: Infinity Trip Its a physics-based titles, you control the ship by varying its altitude so that it can slip through the gaps. Infinity Trip is a simple and addictive endless runner game. In this game the player controls a little ship gliding through a beautiful exotic world, avoiding obstacles and collecting coins to unlock new spaceships. With a calm and zen-like background music, this is a perfect relaxing game for the players! Instructions: - Press the left mouse bouton to control your ship - Avoid the Obstacles - Collect coins to unlock new spaceships FEATURES : *Steam Leaderboard *Steam Achievements *Unlock new spaceships *Zen-like background music Come back to try to beat your highscore, and buy new spaceship with all the points you've collected!
